data.name: First Parsec
data.detailed_description:
Take the helm and become a spaceship pilot tasked with saving your home world. Travel the galaxy using interconnected space-jumping gates, outsmart your enemies and fulfil your mission.



Space

Enjoy the freedom of flight, breath-taking views of entire galaxies and planetary clusters and explore them all.



Weapons

Arm yourself and wreak havoc on your enemies with plasma cannons, guided missiles, or time bombs! With your onboard 3D printer, new weapon types or even ships are at your fingertips – just insert the blueprint!



Combat

Face small and nimble enemy ships in fast-paced, intense combat that will test your agility and aiming skills. Plug in a controller or play the old-fashioned way, using a keyboard and mouse.
data.about_the_game:
Take the helm and become a spaceship pilot tasked with saving your home world. Travel the galaxy using interconnected space-jumping gates, outsmart your enemies and fulfil your mission.



Space

Enjoy the freedom of flight, breath-taking views of entire galaxies and planetary clusters and explore them all.



Weapons

Arm yourself and wreak havoc on your enemies with plasma cannons, guided missiles, or time bombs! With your onboard 3D printer, new weapon types or even ships are at your fingertips – just insert the blueprint!



Combat

Face small and nimble enemy ships in fast-paced, intense combat that will test your agility and aiming skills. Plug in a controller or play the old-fashioned way, using a keyboard and mouse.
data.short_description: Venture out on an ambitious mission across the galaxy with a simple goal - to save your home planet. Bask in the dazzling light of distant stars, flashes of plasma cannons, and explosions of enemy ships! This action-packed space fighting simulator is just the thing for a lazy Saturday night!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2-core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4-core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
